description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing labels used in a Kanban board application. It includes state initialization with predefined labels and provides methods for adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving labels.

methods.name: addLabel
methods.description: Adds a new label object to the store.

methods.name: updateLabel
methods.description: Updates an existing label identified by labelId with provided partial updates.

methods.name: deleteLabel
methods.description: Removes a label from the store based on labelId.

methods.name: getLabelById
methods.description: Retrieves a label object by its ID, or null if not found.
